name.baseName: cement production;cement, ordinary portland cement, 42.5MPa;wet rotary kiln
水泥生产;水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥, 42.5MPa;湿法回转窑

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Wet rotary kiln production process.The raw material limestone is crushed by crusher, and the raw materials were crushed and washed into a slurry. The limestone, clay (slurry), iron powder, and appropriate amount of water are fed into the mill for grinding at the grinding head of raw material mill. The ground raw material slurry is pumped into the slurry storage by slurry pump, and then fed into the wet rotary kiln for calcination after evenly blending and meeting the requirements. The clinker from the kiln is cooled by the clinker cooling equipment and then sent to the clinker storage, then mixed with mixed materials and gypsum in a certain ratio, ground by the cement mill and then into the cement warehouse, packaged by the packaging machine and shipped out of the factory or in bulk.
湿法回转窑生产工艺。原料石灰石经破碎机破碎，原料粘土经破碎、淘洗成浆体，在生料磨的磨头将石灰石、粘土（浆体）、铁粉及适量水喂入磨内进行粉磨。磨制成的生料浆由泥浆泵送入料浆库中，经调配均匀并符合要求后喂入湿法回转窑中煅烧。出窑熟料通过熟料冷却设备冷却后送入熟料储存库，然后与混合材料、石膏按一定的比例混合，经水泥磨粉磨后再入水泥库，通过包装机包装外运出厂或散装出厂。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The raw material limestone is crushed by the crusher 4, and the raw material clay is crushed and washed into a slurry. At the grinding head of the raw material grinding mill 7, the limestone, clay (slurry), iron powder and appropriate amount of water are fed into the grinding mill for powder grinding. The raw material slurry made by grinding is sent to the material slurry warehouse 8 by the mud pump. After being evenly prepared and meeting the requirements, it is fed to the wet rotary kiln 9 for calcining. The kiln clinker is cooled by the clinker cooling equipment and then sent to the clinker storage warehouse. It is then mixed with mixed materials and gypsum in a certain proportion, ground by a cement mill, and then put into the cement warehouse. It is packaged by a packaging machine and shipped out of the factory or in bulk. Factory.

原 料 石 灰 石经 破 碎机 4 破 碎，原 料 粘 土经 破 碎 、 淘 洗 成 浆 体 ，在 生 料 磨 7 的 磨头将 石 灰 石 、 粘 土 ( 浆体 ) 、 铁粉 及 适 量水 喂 入 磨 内进行 粉 磨 。 磨 制成 的生 料 浆 由泥 浆泵送 入 料 浆库 8 中，经调 配 均 匀 并 符 合要 求 后 喂入 湿 法回转 窑 9 中锻 烧 。 出 窑熟料通 过 熟 料 冷 却 设 备 冷 却 后送 入 熟 料 储存 库，然 后 与混 合 材 料 、 石 膏按 一 定 的 比 例 混 合，经 水 泥 磨 粉 磨 后再入 水 泥 库，通过 包装 机 包装 外运 出 厂 或 散 装 出 厂 。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set describes the production process of ordinary Portland cement with a strength grade of 42.5MPa, using the wet rotary kiln method. The cement produced is suitable for construction applications requiring high early strength gain, such as large-scale infrastructure projects, commercial buildings, and residential constructions.
该数据集描述了使用湿法回转窑方法生产的42.5MPa级普通硅酸盐水泥的生产过程。所生产的水泥适用于需要高早期强度增益的建筑应用，如大型基础设施项目、商业建筑和住宅建设。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The functional unit is the service performance of 1 kilogram of cement with a 28-day compressive strength of 42.5MPa, that is, IFu=42.5kgMPa.The research scope is defined as: raw material pretreatment, raw material grinding, raw material calcination, clinker grinding, cement homogenization, and cement storage.
以1千克28天抗压强度为42.5MPa的水泥所具有的使用性能为功能单位，即IFu=42.5kgMPa。研究范围界定为：原料预处理一生料粉磨一生料煅烧一熟料粉磨一水泥均化一水泥储存。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 曹晓润. (2005). 低环境负荷型水泥的生态环境评价 [硕士, 武汉理工大学].
曹晓润. (2005). 低环境负荷型水泥的生态环境评价 [硕士, 武汉理工大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), the user must ensure that the scope of their study matches the defined boundaries of the dataset, which include raw material pretreatment, raw material grinding, raw material calcination, clinker grinding, cement homogenization, and cement storage. It is important to note that the data represents a specific compressive strength (42.5MPa at 28 days) and the wet process technology. Data users should not extrapolate this information to other types of cement or different production methods without proper adjustment.
在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，用户必须确保其研究范围与数据集定义的边界匹配，包括原料预处理、原料粉磨、原料煅烧、熟料粉磨、水泥均化和水泥储存。重要的是要注意，数据代表了特定的抗压强度（28天时42.5MPa）和湿法工艺技术。数据使用者在没有进行适当调整的情况下，不应将此信息外推至其他类型的水泥或不同的生产方法。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

原始数据为0.1807kg标准煤，这里换算为硬煤，换算公式为1kg硬煤=0.929kg标准煤。

Dust, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter.
粉尘，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。

Sulfur dioxide. Considering the actual operating conditions of domestic cement plants and the development trend for the foreseeable future, the statistical average of measured data is adopted for this evaluation.
二氧化硫。考虑到国内水泥厂运行的实际情况和未来很长时间的发展趋势，本次评价采用实测数据的统计平均值。

Nitrogen oxides. Considering the actual operating conditions of domestic cement plants and the development trend for the foreseeable future, the statistical average of measured data is adopted for this evaluation.
氮氧化物。考虑到国内水泥厂运行的实际情况和未来很长时间的发展趋势，本次评价采用实测数据的统计平均值。

Carbon dioxide. Considering the actual operating conditions of domestic cement plants and the development trend for the foreseeable future, the statistical average of measured data is adopted for this evaluation.
二氧化碳。考虑到国内水泥厂运行的实际情况和未来很长时间的发展趋势，本次评价采用实测数据的统计平均值。
P.O. IFu=42.5kg MPa
P.O.IFu=42.5kgMPa。
